name: Defend The Reactor - LD49 Prototype
description:
Punch and Kick away incoming aliens while your comrade escapes! If the core reactor reaches critical levels, its game over!

Keyboard: D to advance dialogue and punch, E to kick, Space to Jump, Arrow Keys to move. 
Controller (XBox): B to Advance dialogue and punch, X to kick, and A to Jump.

This is my submission for LD49's theme "Unstable", and is just a prototype. This is my first time submitting something for a jam though, and I'm proud of that! It's not much, but with just a bit more work and refinement it'll make for some great hack-n-slash base code.

Additional credits:
Music by @WarxTron
Walk and idle animations, and debugging assistance from @Newbic
